DOC.TEXT: Shirley , 51 , manager at a clothing factory Patience , 30 , organizer for a retail trade_union Churchill , 28 , teacher Audrey , 21 , unemployed Nathan , 17 , student * Home : Soweto * Politics : Member of the African National Congress * Background : Shirley ' s parents were born in Johannesburg of parents who had migrated from rural_areas . * Shirley Mofokeng : " The ANC will need much time to turn things around -- three to five years for changes to become visible -- and people will have to be patient , though they won ' t like it . If we are not steadfast on the course we set , we could ruin the new South Africa. "
